titles: A heavenly conference between Christ and Mary after His resurrection. Wherein the intimate familiarity, and near relation between Christ and a believer is discovered.
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed for John Rothwel, and are to be sold at the Fountain and Bear in Cheap-side,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Resurrection --  Early works to 1800.
